s: I really like this lemon pepper it has a little more flavors than other brands I have tried I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT ... Perfect blend and versatile. It also helps with giving meats like pork and chicken a nice brown hue different than just browning with salt and pepper. You do have to be careful not to have the temp too high. This blend does sear quickly at high temps. I do keep a 16oz bottle that I refill when purchasing spices ...
